recipe_text: Quantity; 450; Prepare 450 grams of ground beef| Measurement; 60; Measure out 60 grams of whiskey| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of garlic powder| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of onion powder| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of salt| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of black pepper| Quantity; 4; Prepare 4 hamburger buns| Measurement; 56; Measure out 56 grams of cheese slices| Measurement; 50; Measure out 50 grams of lettuce| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of tomato, sliced| Measurement; 50; Measure out 50 grams of onion, sliced| Untimed; None; In a bowl, combine ground beef, whiskey, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and black pepper| Untimed; None; Shape the mixture into 4 patties| Untimed; None; Preheat a skillet or grill over medium-high heat| Untimed; None; Cook the patties for 3-4 minutes on each side| Untimed; None; Add a cheese slice to each patty during the last minute of cooking| Untimed; None; Toast the hamburger buns| Untimed; None; Assemble the burgers with lettuce, tomato, onion, and patties| Finish; None; Serve and enjoy!
title: Triple Seared Whiskey Burger
